entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
